name: Die Sieben Raben
description:
A comic book Twine game. A Cwine, if you will. Based on the Grimms fairytale "The Seven Ravens" made for the Public Domain Jam.

This is a web-game. Go to www.diesiebenraben.com to play.

Note: Some people are getting confused at the start. The orange speech bubbles are clickable and advance the story.
